info.name: MAL_AnimePlusGraph DeepDark
info.description:
Satisfy thy craving for anime and organization. May the dark be kinder on thine eyes. (MAL_AnimePlusGraph-DeepDark)

This is a dark theme for MyAnimeList Anime Plus Graph inspired by FT DeepDark.

Also, credit where credit is due for the color palettes. (@KDE, @horst3180, @linuxmint, Firefox, YouTube and Discord)

Official GitHub page, with screenshots, available here.
